text: AqSiraqmava# nayati saSukraqtvAyAthOq saM Ba#ratyEqvainaqt ta(gm) sOma#-mAhriqyamA#NaM gandhaqrvO viqSvAva#saqH parya#muShNAqth sa tiqsrO rAtrIqH pari#muShitO&vasaqt tasmA$t tiqsrO rAtrI$H krIqtaH sOmO# vasatiq tE dEqvA a#bruvaqnth strIkA#mAq vai ga#ndhaqrvA sstriqyA niShkrI#NAqmEtiq tE vAcaq(gg)q striyaqmEka#hAyanIM kRuqtvA tayAq nira#krINaqnth sA rOqhid-rUqpaM kRuqtvA ga#ndhaqrvEByO#- [  ] 43
